synopsis.text: May, a dedicated technical officer, finds himself at the heart of the One Year War in Universal Century 0079, serving in the Zeon 603rd Technical Evaluation Unit. His mission: to test and evaluate cutting-edge military technology aboard the repurposed civilian transport ship, Jotunheim. As the war evolves, May grapples with the challenge of making a tangible difference amidst the shifting tides of conflict. This three-part, fully-rendered 3D CGI feature offers a unique perspective on the war, showcasing a variety of innovative weapons systems, from powerful beam cannons to versatile tank/mech hybrids and reimagined mobile suits. As part of Gundam's 25th Anniversary Celebration, this OVA invites viewers to experience the One Year War through the eyes of a weapon tester, providing a fresh and engaging take on the iconic franchise.
